login.title: Login area
login.subtitle: You need to provide your username and password to login my awesome application

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password?
forgotPassword.subtitle: We can't remind your old password, but we can help you to assign for a new password

validators.mustBeCamelCase: Value must be in Camel Case format!
validators.maxTwoWords: Control value must contain one or two words!
validators.onlyLatin: Value must contain only latin chars without number or special symbols!
validators.invalidDateFormat: Invalid date format! Please use the required format. Allowed date formats are: YYYY/MM/DD, DD-MMM-YY, DD MMMM YYYY.

login-err.content: Invalid username or password, please try again.

logout.title: Logout
logout.content: Do you really want to logout the application?

user.name: Name
user.newPassword: New password (normal string or md5 hash)

text.nameIsNotForChange: Username can not be changed! If you change the name of the current user, a new user will be created.
